shortdesc.ph: Stops or resumes publishing the local video stream.
Stops or resumes publishing the local video stream.
Stops or resumes publishing the local video stream.
Stops or resumes publishing the local video stream.

p.codeblock: Future<void> muteLocalVideoStreamEx( {required bool mute, required RtcConnection connection});
public abstract int MuteLocalVideoStreamEx(bool mute, RtcConnection connection);

section.p: After this method is successfully called, the remote user receives the callback.
After this method is successfully called, the remote user triggers the callback.
After this method is successfully called, the remote user receives the callback.
After this method is successfully called, remote users trigger the callback.

ul.li: This method does not affect the video capture state and does not disable the camera.
This method does not affect the video capture status and does not disable the camera.
This method does not affect the video capture state and does not disable the camera.
This method does not affect the video capture status and does not disable the camera.

plentry.pd:
Whether to stop sending the local video stream.
: Stop sending the local video stream.
: (Default) Send the local video stream.

section.title: Return Values

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and troubleshooting.
< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
